Name: Last Heroes 2
About the game: Plot Amelia and Roland are headed to Odaro continent, where Amelia thinks she will find her parents and discover the truth about her past. However, reaching Odaro, they realize that it won't be an easy task. They join forces with Lutania Army, a group of soldiers that are fighting against Illion.
